abstract: Shares of Smith & Nephew surged on the London Stock Exchange on Monday, getting a boost from a report that the medical device maker had rejected a $10.9 billion takeover bid by Johnson & Johnson.
snippet: Shares of Smith & Nephew surged on the London Stock Exchange on Monday, getting a boost from a report that the medical device maker had rejected a $10.9 billion takeover bid by Johnson & Johnson.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Smith & Nephew surged on the London Stock Exchange on Monday, getting a boost from a report that the medical device maker had rejected a £7 billion, or $10.9 billion, takeover bid by Johnson & Johnson.

headline.main: British Medical Device Maker Rises on Talk It Rejected J.&J.
